english.segment1: why, why you ignore me. I'm telling you the truth. his mercy set me free. he wants the same for you. so listen carefully, time is running out. this world is going to end someday. i hope you open your eyes. you want to stay blind to ignore. the reality we are living. but it is the truth. this maybe is the end. so, raise your fist and. let god take control. it's not religion it's a secure option. there is no other way to be saved.
